title: De Kemping
overview: Summer 2020. Nine young people step onto a meadow, somewhere in De Kempen. Over the next two months, they will build and operate a campsite here, led by creative centipede and youth counselor Tijs Vanneste. These are young people who find it difficult to find work. For two months they braved heat waves, downpours and COVID-19. They clean showers and toilets, run the camping cafe and organize bingo matches. And they learn to work together and take responsibility, in order to get a better chance on the labor market...
